overview: The classic documentary of the "bigfoot of the Everglades". Starring journeyman wildlife tracker, and native gladesman, Dave Shealy, along with his brother Jack and a cast of larger than life characters from the small town of Ochoppee, Florida. Filmed entirely in the Big Cypress Swamp/Everglades National Park. Directed and narrated by Nate Martin aka Gator Nate Augustus. Featuring an awesome soundtrack and ACTUAL SKUNK APE FOOTAGE!!!!
title: The Ochoppee Skunk Ape
